Name: Fear Eater
Skills: Brawl 4, Coercion 4, Cool 1, Discipline 4, Perception 3, Stealth 2, Vigilance 2
Special Features: Whenever a creature moves to within, or starts their turn within, Extended range of this creature they must immediately succeed on a Difficulty 3 Discipline Check or gain the Frightened Condition for 3 rounds.
